question: Which waterbody forms the coastline of "French Riviera"?
explanation: The Mediterranean Sea forms the coastline of French Riviera, in the southeast corner of France. This region is extended to the France-Italy border in the east. The principality of Monaco is a semi-enclave within the region. This coastline was one of the first modern resort areas. It is also a major yachting and cruising area with several marinas along its coast.
